page.title: 19Playtime at school
page.content:
{#1 }Often Kylie and me play {'Leapfrog'}with the boys. The rules are you have two teams and one team has to try and tig the other. When you are caught you have to crouch down and other people in your team can jump over you and free you. There is a den for the people which have to be caught, they are called 'runners'.
{#2 }My favourite playground game is {'British Bulldog'. }The rules are that you must get to the other end of the playground to free the people who have been caught. Then we have to get back to the other end. There are two people 'on' and they have to pick a person to get to the other end and then they have to try to catch that person.
